Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Root/Wallace
ShortDescription: Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Wallace, then resuming their normal route on 43rd due to street blockage near Root/Wallace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Wallace, then resuming their normal route on 43rd due to street blockage near Root/Wallace.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Halsted
ShortDescription: NB #156 LaSalle rrtd via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park & will wait recovery time on Sheridan due to street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park and will wait recovery time on Sheridan, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

(Note: Buses will not be going to Halsted Terminal.)
